chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para:
First download the latest version of igraph and uncompress it to a temporary directory:
$ wget http://geza.kzoo.edu/~csardi/igraph_latest.tar.gz $ tar xzf igraph_latest.tar.gz $ cd igraph-latest

Installing the igraph R package is very simple, the igraph directory in the tarball contains a complete R package. Eg. in Linux you can install it like
$ R CMD INSTALL -l ~/.R/library igraph
Alternatively you can download the R package version of igraph only.

To install the complete R library typing
$ ./configure $ make $ make install
(the latter as root) should work on most systems. You can try
$ ./configure --help
to see installations options, and reading the INSTALL file.
